ecosystem.name: Beraborrow
ecosystem.description: A decentralised protocol, allows users to take out interest free loans by using the iBGT token as collateral.

ecosystem.name: Infrared
ecosystem.description: A dedicated framework for both BGT stakers and liquidity providers to boosting user rewards.

ecosystem.name: Yeet
ecosystem.description: An on-chain game theory experience with no dominant game theory strategy

ecosystem.name: Stake Stone
ecosystem.description: Omnichain liquidity asset protocol building an adaptive staking network for liquid ETH / BTC

ecosystem.name: Olympus DAO
ecosystem.description: The Olympus protocol is a decentralized financial (DeFi) system that supports OHM, a treasury backed token on the Ethereum network.

ecosystem.name: Stryke
ecosystem.description: A decentralized options exchange offers permissionless access to options trading for crypto assets

ecosystem.name: Origami
ecosystem.description: Tokenizing automated leverage positions to abstract away position management

ecosystem.name: Gummi
ecosystem.description: A leverage trading platform with an attached money market that supports any token

ecosystem.name: IVX
ecosystem.description: A liquid options AMM built on Berachain that allows users to trade zero days to expiry option contracts

ecosystem.name: D2 Finance
ecosystem.description: An on-chain hedge fund providing sophisticated options-based vault architecture

ecosystem.name: Ooga Booga
ecosystem.description: Berachain's native liquidity aggregator seamlessly integrates with a wide range of Dapps.

ecosystem.name: Dolomite
ecosystem.description: Dolomite is the only lending and borrowing platform that can support over 1,000 unique assets. Lend, borrow, and earn.

ecosystem.name: Ethena
ecosystem.description: Ethena is a synthetic dollar protocol built on Ethereum that provides a crypto-native solution for money.

ecosystem.name: Ether Fi
ecosystem.description: The liquid restaking token that rewards you more across DeFi.

ecosystem.name: Lombard
ecosystem.description: Lombard is an over-collateralized loans in the DeFi ecosystem, allowing users to deposit crypto assets as collateral to borrow other assets.

ecosystem.name: Symbiosis
ecosystem.description: Symbiosis is a cross-chain AMM DEX that pools together liquidity from different networks: L1s and L2s, EVM and non-EVM. With Symbiosis, you can easily swap any token and move your assets across different networks.
